post:
Hello Let people , 

we will start offer a limited quantity of budget dedi (limited to the first 30 orders) with the follow config :

<br />processor : 2xL5620 or 2xL5630 (ramdom)
<br />16 gb ram (if you pay quarently you will recive for free 32gb) (for 6 month in advance you will recive 64 gb)
<br />4x146 gb hdd SAS or 1x1tb sata3
<br />1 ipv4 (maximum allowed /server 5 usable ips wit a cost of 1 eur/ip)
<br />port speed 1gbps 
<br />10tb/mo traffic included
<br />ILO included
<br />aditional hdd can be added up to 8x4tb for the price 10eur/1tb/mo

<br />**the price will be 37.5 eur/mo or 40 $**

<br />you can order here : https://secure.hostsolutions.ro/cart.php?a=add&pid=291

<br />[Also please read our TOS before you buy](http://en.hostsolutions.ro/about/tos/)

Please note : your server will be delivered in the next 24 hours after you have payed or in exceptional case maximum 48 hours (in case of huge quantity of orders) , so please do not open tikets to ask when will be delivered. 

Thanks , 
Marius
